❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the caladium hexagon cover is a lightweight drapey cover that is beautiful to use over a bathing suit or even as a tunic with a tank and leggings you will find so many reasons to make this cover a go-to piece in your summer wardrobe **crochet hook ** size us f 3 75 mm 2 **notions ** yarn needle scissors removable stitch markers 2 **yarn ** we crochet comfy fingering 3 shown in flamingo colorway fingering weight yarn **yardage ** xs 1 400 yards 7 skeins s/m 1 800 yards 9 skeins l/xl 2 300 yards 11 skeins 2x 2 700 yards 13 skeins 3x/4x 3 200 yards 15 skeins 5x 3 700 yards 17 skeins **abbreviations/stitches ** chain- chain bobble - see instructions in notes double_crochet- double_crochet rs- right side sts- stitches stacked single_crochet ws- wrong side **gauge** 21 sts and 11 row = 4x4 10 cm in double_crochet **measurements/sizes ** finished bust with 8-10 inch ease bust sizes xs 32-34 83-86 cm s/m 36-38 91-96 cm l/xl 40-46 102-116 cm 2x 48-50 122-127 cm 3x/4x 52-56 132-142 cm 5x 58-60 147-152 *this garment has approx 8-10 20-25 cm of ease **skill level ** intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www
